data.title: How to Become a Freemason — Illinois Freemasonry
data.meta_description: Start your journey to becoming a Freemason, a part of our brotherhood, and the best version of yourself. Join Illinois Freemasonry.
data.text:
Becoming a Freemason means joining a global brotherhood of men on the same journey, working together to become better and build a better world. We accept men from all walks of life who demonstrate upright conduct and acknowledge a belief in a Supreme Being.

Illinois Freemasonry is a fraternity committed to imbuing the virtues of equality, charity, tolerance, fellowship, and brotherly love in its members. If you know a Freemason, then we encourage you to reach out and talk with him about his experience in Freemasonry to see if it’s a right fit for you. Review the information below, which includes an opportunity to officially express your interest in becoming a Freemason.
